parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>0.74

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control - Tree View

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns scalar data from item on given path. IDC means id of parent Tree View.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''tvValue''' [idc, path]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> idc: [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> path: [[Array]] of [[Number]]s

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]] - integer

</value></part><part><name> s2</name>=<value> ctrl [[tvValue]] path

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> ctrl: [[Control]]

</value></part><part><name> p22</name>=<value> path: [[Array]] of [[Number]]s

</value></part><part><name> r2</name>=<value> [[Number]] - integer

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[tvValue]] [101, [0]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_ctrl [[tvValue]] [0,0,0];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[tvAdd]], [[tvClear]], [[tvCollapse]], [[tvCount]], [[tvCurSel]], [[tvData]], [[tvDelete]], [[tvExpand]], [[tvPicture]], [[tvSetCurSel]], [[tvSetData]], [[tvSetPicture]], [[tvSetValue]], [[tvSort]], [[tvSortByValue]], [[tvText]]
</value></part></template></root>
